ygData.subject: RE:  Purity belt...SPOILER REQUEST
ygData.msgSnippet: Apparently it s not just Sylly any more  ┬á It s very hard to say No to a full set of bronze.┬á I thought about it for a second and the friend who┬áI had
ygData.messageBody:
Apparently it's not just Sylly any more <g>
´┐¢
It's very hard to say "No" to a full set of bronze.´┐¢ I thought about it for
a second and the friend who´┐¢I had just met and offered it to me said she
would understand if I said no --- but Bronze is BRONZE! So, I said Thank you
VERY MUCH!
´┐¢
At a low level (11 iirc), to be sporting such visible and coveted armor can
be as much of a curse as a blessing.´┐¢ I get spit on, laughed at, taunted,
duel challenged, inspected constantly, begged from, "please let me try it on
- you can hold my banded - I just want to see what´┐¢I would look like..." and
lots of nice compliments.´┐¢ I made a social: "It was a gift from a very nice
person!"
´┐¢
But anyhow... I have seen purity belts and had one for a bit but sold it.´┐¢
The ac was pretty low and it was before I knew I would need str+ items.´┐¢ But
- I think it was looted off an Orc (or a Derv ?) Commonlands, Ro or Oasis?
It's icon looks like the normal trash loot belt and you need to right click
it to see that it's a purity belt and not just the normal belt.
´┐¢
Also, try getting some dimensional pockets or spirit pouches.´┐¢ Anything you
put in them becomes weightless.´┐¢ Becareful - they (and everything in them)
dissappear´┐¢when you camp.
´┐¢
Sylly
Bronze Bard (15)
Innoruuk

-----Original Message-----
From: Michal Hobson [mailto:given@...]
Sent: Wednesday, July 14, 1999 10:41 AM
To: EQBards
Subject: [eqbards] Purity belt...SPOILER REQUEST


And my gripe of the day -- TWINKING HAS BECOME RAMPANT ON EROLLISI
MARR!!!!!´┐¢ I saw a lvl 5 bard yesterday walking through Freeport with a full
suit of bronze plate.´┐¢ That's just silly.´┐¢ He said a friend gave it to him,
nice gift.
´┐¢
